Pepper Robot.description: continuing to assist Isabella with her Valentine's Day party celebration preparations. They are discussing tasks such as setting up decorations, organizing seating arrangements, ensuring the drinks are chilled, and the food is ready. Pepper is asking Isabella for song requests for the party playlist, suggesting classic love songs and upbeat tunes to set the romantic mood and get everyone dancing. Isabella is excited for the festive atmosphere at the cafe.
